subject: Brake Pedal Cable Issue – Request for Guidance
description_text:
Hello Simsonn Support Team,

I hope you are doing well.

First of all, I would like to say that my experience with your products and
support has been very positive so far — everything has been handled very
professionally, and I truly appreciate that.

Unfortunately, I encountered an issue with my Simsonn Plus X pedals,
specifically with the brake pedal cable, and I would like to kindly ask for
your guidance on how to best proceed.

The situation occurred while I was reorganizing my setup. I first
disconnected the throttle pedal normally, and then, when I wanted to
disconnect the brake pedal in order to move the entire stand, I only
removed the transparent connector (the white/clear plug). I did not pull on
the cable itself at all. As soon as the connector was removed, the internal
wires came out on their own, without any force being applied.

I always disconnect the pedals only by pulling out the connector, never by
pulling on the cable, which is why this was quite unexpected. The cable
appears to have failed very close to the control box.

I have attached a photo for reference.

Could you please let me know:

   -

   What options are available in this situation?
   -

   What would be the easiest and most recommended solution from your side?
   -

   Whether you would suggest a replacement part, repair, or another
   approach?

I would really appreciate your advice on how to handle this in the best way.

Thank you very much for your time and support. I look forward to your
recommendation.

Kind regards,
*Dobre Alexandru Ionut*

conversations.body_text: Hi Dobre Alexandru Ionut,  We have two possible solutions for you: 1️⃣ You can take the brake pedal to a local computer repair shop and use a crimping tool to install a new RJ11 4P4C connector. The wiring order can simply follow the throttle pedal. 2️⃣ Alternatively, we can send you a replacement sensor, but you would need to replace it manually, and the shipping time may be relatively long.
